lines.text:
[unaware of approaching derailment]
This train is really goin'. The engineer must be late for dinner.
The way he's traveling he hasn't eaten all week!

[sarcastically]
Any special kind? Or would mine do?
Well, I would like to be a reporter. I haven't had any experience in writing, but... uh...
Well, I have other qualifications that might be valuable.

[after vote to remain on Krypton]
The counsel has spoken, Jor-El.
Not spoken, Ro-Zon. It has pronounced the death sentence for all Krypton.
